headline: RTX Surges to Record Highs as Defense Orders Explode
summary: RTX stock reached new highs as surging defense orders and commercial aviation demand combine to offer investors a secure financial harbor for the future.

headline: Is RTX Still Attractive After a 57% Surge and Rich Valuation Metrics?
summary: If you are wondering whether RTX is still worth buying after such a substantial run up, or if you have missed the boat, this breakdown will help you figure out what the current price really implies. RTX has climbed 6.2% over the last week, 3.7% over the last month, and 57.1% over the past year, with its share price now around $182.11 and up 193.2% over five years. This naturally raises questions about both upside and downside from here. Recently, RTX has stayed in the spotlight as a key...
